entry_points.name_zh: 社会服务办公室（SSO）+ ComCare 热线

schemes.summary_en: Temporary financial support for individuals/families facing difficulties; assessed holistically by SSOs.
schemes.summary_zh: 为面临短期经济困难的个人/家庭提供支持；由 SSO 进行整体评估。
eligibility_zh: 整体评估（收入、储蓄、家庭支持等）。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via SupportGoWhere or visit the nearest SSO.
how_to_apply_zh: 可通过 SupportGoWhere 申请或前往附近 SSO。

schemes.summary_en: Support package for lower- and middle-income Singaporeans to manage cost-of-living (different components).
schemes.summary_zh: 帮助中低收入人群应对生活成本的支持计划（含不同组成部分）。
eligibility_en: Eligibility differs by component; check official pages.
eligibility_zh: 不同组成部分条件不同；以官网为准。
how_to_apply_en: Some components are automatic; verify instructions on official pages.
how_to_apply_zh: 部分项目自动发放；以官网说明为准。

schemes.summary_en: Vouchers for Singaporean households to help with daily expenses at participating merchants/hawkers/supermarkets.
schemes.summary_zh: 为新加坡家庭提供用于日常消费的购物券，可在指定商户/小贩中心/超市使用。
eligibility_en: Singaporean households; details vary by tranche.
eligibility_zh: 新加坡家庭；不同批次规则以官网为准。
how_to_apply_en: Claim via the official CDC vouchers site and follow the steps.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 CDC vouchers 官网领取并按步骤操作。

schemes.summary_en: Subsidised public rental housing for eligible lower-income households.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的低收入家庭提供补贴性质公共租赁住房。
eligibility_en: Must meet HDB eligibility criteria (see official pages).
eligibility_zh: 需满足 HDB 资格条件（以官网为准）。
how_to_apply_en: Apply via HDB e-services and follow the application process.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 HDB 线上入口申请并按流程办理。

schemes.summary_en: Temporary accommodation for homeless families who have exhausted other options.
schemes.summary_zh: 为已无其他住宿选择的无家可归家庭提供临时安置。
eligibility_en: Assessment by service provider is required.
how_to_apply_en: Start from SupportGoWhere or contact SSO for urgent housing support.
how_to_apply_zh: 可从 SupportGoWhere 查询或紧急联系 SSO。

schemes.summary_en: Subsidies for medical/dental care at participating clinics for Singapore Citizens (tiered).
schemes.summary_zh: 为新加坡公民在参与计划的诊所/牙科诊所提供分级补贴。
eligibility_en: Singapore Citizens; tier depends on criteria (see official pages).
eligibility_zh: 新加坡公民；补贴等级取决于条件（以官网为准）。
how_to_apply_en: Apply online via the CHAS portal.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 CHAS 线上门户申请。

schemes.summary_en: Financial assistance for patients who have difficulty paying medical bills; usually via Medical Social Worker.
schemes.summary_zh: 为难以支付医疗账单的患者提供援助；通常通过医疗社工办理。
eligibility_en: Assessed by the institution/Medical Social Worker.
eligibility_zh: 由医疗机构/医疗社工评估。
how_to_apply_en: Ask the Medical Social Worker at the hospital/clinic.
how_to_apply_zh: 联系就诊机构的医疗社工。

schemes.name_zh: Silver Support 长者补助计划
schemes.summary_en: Quarterly cash payouts for eligible low-income elderly; auto-assessed.
schemes.summary_zh: 为符合条件的低收入长者提供按季度发放现金补助；自动评估。
eligibility_en: Singapore Citizen aged 65+; assessed automatically (see official pages).
eligibility_zh: 65+ 新加坡公民；自动评估（以官网为准）。

schemes.name_zh: AIC 照护服务（长者与照护者支持）
schemes.summary_en: One-stop portal for community care services and caregiver resources.
schemes.summary_zh: 提供社区照护服务与照护者资源的一站式平台。
eligibility_en: Depends on service type and assessment.
eligibility_zh: 取决于服务类型与评估。
how_to_apply_en: Browse services via AIC portal and follow service-specific steps.
how_to_apply_zh: 通过 AIC 平台查询服务并按对应流程办理。
